presentation.title: From API Craftsmanship to API Landscaping
presentation.toc: Moving from designing and managing individual APIs to the successful management of large, diverse, and evolving API landscapes can be challenging. But it is a transition that is necessary to realize the value of API-centric organizations, where each and every product provides an API. Scaling the API practice requires a strategy that balances the need for some coordination, as well as providing teams sufficient autonomy so that their API products can be made available as quickly as possible. In this presentation, we look at the general approach and strategy of how to scale the API practice, and at some patterns and anti-patterns.

slide.title: Digital Transformation Vision
slide.blockquote: Our Digital Transformation Initiative will turn us into the leader of the industry by allowing us to interact with our customers more easily, and more frequently. By increasing the number of customer touchpoints and using the resulting feedback to quickly and relentlessly adapt and improve our offerings, we will be able to outperform our competition and turn into the market leader within the next three years.
